meanings.definition: A small stool or low seat.
meanings.sent1: I sat on the creepie to tie my shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: The children gathered around the campfire, sitting on the creepie.
meanings.sent3: The cat jumped onto the creepie and pretended to be the king of the castle.
meanings.sent4: The creepie in the corner of the room seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The old wooden creepie creaked under the weight of the tired traveler.

meanings.definition: A type of Scottish ghost or spirit.
meanings.sent1: The legend of the creepie haunted the village for generations.
meanings.sent2: The creepie was said to roam the moors on misty nights.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous creepie played pranks on unsuspecting travelers.
meanings.sent4: The eerie presence of the creepie sent shivers down the villagers' spines.
meanings.sent5: The ancient castle was rumored to be home to a malevolent creepie.
